amendment.description: To provide that, of the amount appropriated by title VI for Customs and Border Protection for air and marine interdiction, operations, maintenance, and procurement, such funds as are necessary may be available for the final Northern border air wing site in Michigan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4673 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4673 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S7496-7497; text: CR S7497) To provide that, of the amount appropriated by title VI for Customs and Border Protection for air and marine interdiction, operations, maintenance, and procurement, such funds as are necessary may be available for the final Northern border air wing site in Michigan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4673 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Levin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4673 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
